name: Keeping It Cool
description:
A short, cute little pixel art platformer concept! Get to the end of each level before your freeze meter hits 0 and your ice cream melts! Dodge fire and help Sera give ice cream to the love of her life! Blue coins also refill the freeze meter. 

This was made based on the game jam theme, "cold." I have only been able to work on it for a few days, but I hope you enjoy!
